title: Still playing like a noob
body:
Started one year ago. Mained{{champion:17}}  but now I main {{champion:103}} 
My whole thing is I know I still suck but I'm a silver 3. I trained solo for months now farming laning differently but I still play like a noob. Some one help !!! Also cannot match against Talon I will die !!

replies.body:
Your scores all seem pretty good (match history wise). 

One thing you can work to do is to learn to [CS more consistently ](https://www.pinterest.com/pin/439734351096970489/)(a couple of your games have reached the 40 min mark with you having less than 150 cs). 

Another thing that might help is to expand your champion pool. A couple more champions means you have more freedom. For example, if you struggle against talon, I would suggest picking up someone like Diana, who matches his "in your face" mobility and can burst him down just as quick. 

I would suggest playing with friends so that when you try something out and maybe it doesn't go to plan, they wont rage at you. 

Feel free to add me in game ♥

Against Talon don't fight him after level 5 because he does an amazing amount of damage which most people don't realise. If you hit 6 first then kill him then. Save your Charm for when he jumps to you if you can and make sure you're aiming your Q efficiently. Don't overextend by yourself because he can cover a lot of ground if he Ults before you see him and still almost kill you instantly without the first part of its damage. You'll probably want to get Zhonya's first.
